SEARCH
Module OOPCAMSFinalcodes
Package controllers

Class PasswordManager

java.lang.Object
controllers.PasswordManager
public class PasswordManager extends Object
This class handles password-related operations, such as hashing passwords, validating password strength, and verifying user input against stored password hashes. It uses PBKDF2 with HMAC SHA1 for hashing.

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    static final String
    defaultpassword
    The default hashed password, generated using the hash method for the default password 'password'.

  • Method Details

    • hash

      public static String hash(String password)
      Hashes a given password using PBKDF2 with HMAC SHA1.
      Parameters:
      password - The password to hash.
      Returns:
      The hashed password.

    • matchPassword

      public static boolean matchPassword(String userinput, String storedhash)
      Compares a user-inputted password with a stored hashed password.
      Parameters:
      userinput - The user-inputted password.
      storedhash - The stored hashed password.
      Returns:
      true if the input matches the stored hash, false otherwise.

    • storeNewPassword

      public static boolean storeNewPassword(String newpass, User u)
      Stores a new password for a user after checking its strength.
      Parameters:
      newpass - The new password to be stored.
      u - The user for whom the password is to be stored.
      Returns:
      true if the password is successfully stored, false otherwise.

    • checkPasswordStrength

      public static boolean checkPasswordStrength(String newpass)
      Checks the strength of a password based on specific criteria (length, character types).
      Parameters:
      newpass - The password to check.
      Returns:
      true if the password meets the strength criteria, false otherwise.
